Reptilian scale mail was a set of enchanted scale armor made out of an unfortunate lizardfolks hide.
Reptilian scale mail was a set of tanned and cured scale armor crafted out of a lizardfolks hide. The armor was masterfully made and gave the wearer improved defense only slightly hindering their ability to cast spells.
A set of reptilian scale mail could be found in a locked and trapped chest within the Dwarven Dungeons Main Halls in 1369 DR. The armor was crafted by one of the tribes of orcs or orogs who feuded with the sorcerer Malgi His lizardfolk tribe in the ruins of Myth Drannor.
